original_text: And at the stream of the brooks that goeth down to the dwelling of Ar, and lieth upon the border of Moab.
korean_text: 모든 골짜기의 비탈은 아르 고을을 향하여 기울어지고 모압의 경계에 닿았도다 하였더라

sentences.original_text: And at the stream of the brooks
that goeth down to the dwelling of Ar
and lieth upon the border of Moab
